Galeri Nusantara Backend

Backend for Galeri Nusantara Project's

Tech Stack

API Documentation

Admin Endpoint

Admin Login

URL: http://127.0.0.1/admin/login POST

Body / Data:
{ username: "username", password: "password" }

Response: 

                        {
                            "status": "Status Here",
                            "message": "Message Here",
                            "data": {
                                "token": "Token for login here"
                            }
                        }

Admin Detail

URL: http://127.0.0.1/admin/detail POST

Body / Data:
{ token: "token" }

Response: 

                        {
                            "status": "Status Here",
                            "message": "Message Here",
                            "data": {
                                "id": admin id here,
                                "username": "admin username here",
                                "email": "admin email here",
                                "role": "admin role here"
                            }
                        }

Contributor Endpoint

Contributor Login

URL: http://127.0.0.1/contributor/login POST

Body / Data:
{ username: "username", password: "password" }

Response: 

                        {
                            "status": "Status Here",
                            "message": "Message Here",
                            "data": {
                                "token": "Token for login here"
                            }
                        }

Contributor Register

URL: http://127.0.0.1/contributor/register POST

Body / Data:
{ username: "username", password: "password", email: "email" }

Response: 

                        {
                            "status": "status here",
                            "message": "message here",
                            "data": {
                                "id": id,
                                "username": "username here",
                                "password": "password here",
                                "email": "email here",
                                "role": "role here"
                            }
                        }

Contributor Detail

URL: http://127.0.0.1/contributor/detail POST

Body / Data:
{ token: "token" }

Response: 

                        {
                            "status": "Status Here",
                            "message": "Message Here",
                            "data": {
                                "id": contributor id here,
                                "username": "contributor username here",
                                "email": "contributor email here",
                                "role": "contributor role here"
                            }
                        }

Budaya Endpoint

Show All Budaya

URL: http://127.0.0.1:8080/budaya GET

Body / Data:

Response: 

                            {
                                "status": "Success",
                                "message": "Get budaya list success!",

Budaya Detail

URL: http://127.0.0.1:8080/budaya/2 GET

Body / Data:

Response: 

                            {
                                "status": "Success",
                                "message": "Success get budaya detail",
                                "data": {
                                    "id": 2,
                                    "title": "Tari Jaipong",
                                    "source": "Sunda",
                                    "description": "Jaipongan adalah sebuah jenis tari pergaulan tradisional masyarakat Sunda yang berasal dari wilayah Karawang dan sangat populer di Indonesia.",
                                    "createdAt": "2024-05-23T04:18:11.355Z",
                                    "updatedAt": "2024-05-23T04:18:11.355Z",
                                    "authorId": 2,
                                    "images": [
                                        {
                                            "id": 4,
                                            "url": "http://res.cloudinary.com/djwftgm6b/image/upload/v1715915182/sample.jpg",
                                            "description": "Sample",
                                            "budayaId": 2
                                        }
                                    ]
                                }
                            }

Create New Budaya

URL: http://127.0.0.1:8080/budaya POST

NOTE: THIS WILL AUTO CREATE SAMPLE IMAGES FOR BUDAYA.

Body / Data:
{ token: "token", title: "title", source: "source", description: "description" }

Response: 

                            {
                                "status": "Success",
                                "message": "Success create new Budaya",
                                "data": {
                                    "id": 6,
                                    "title": "Tari Kecak 2",
                                    "source": "Bali",
                                    "description": "Tari kecak adalah seni tari yang berasal dari Bali. Seni tari kecak ini dipertunjukkan oleh puluhan penari laki-laki yang duduk berbaris dengan pola melingkar dan dengan irama tertentu menyerukan \"cak, cak, cak\" serta mengangkat kedua lengan.",
                                    "createdAt": "2024-05-26T05:07:21.508Z",
                                    "updatedAt": "2024-05-26T05:07:21.508Z",
                                    "authorId": 1
                                }
                            }

Image Endpoint

Contributor Login

URL: http://127.0.0.1:8080/images GET

Body / Data:

Response: 

                            {
                                "status": "Success",
                                "message": "Success get data!",
                                "data": [

Image Detail

URL: http://127.0.0.1:8080/images/4 GET

Body / Data:

Response: 

                            {
                                "status": "Success",
                                "message": "Success get data!",
                                "data": {
                                    "id": 4,
                                    "url": "http://res.cloudinary.com/djwftgm6b/image/upload/v1715915182/sample.jpg",
                                    "description": "Sample",
                                    "budayaId": 2
                                }
                            }

Images By Budaya Id

URL: http://127.0.0.1:8080/images/budaya/1 GET

Body / Data:

Response: 

                            {
                                "status": "Success",
                                "message": "Success get data!",
                                "data": [
                                    {
                                        "id": 1,
                                        "url": "http://res.cloudinary.com/djwftgm6b/image/upload/v1715915182/sample.jpg",
                                        "description": "bunga di taman",
                                        "budayaId": 1
                                    }
                                ]
                            }
